Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "This entire realm is generated by Gestalt's computing power—it's an experiment designed to confirm the awakening of mechanical consciousness.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'During the experiment, the Punishing Virus infected the main host at the ■■■ lab, which led to...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "This is exactly what I told that kid—she didn't ask a single question and just believed me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chosen One?', 3: "Not like it's wrong. It's just..."}
{2: 'Chosen One?', 3: "An incomplete truth isn't really the truth, is it?"}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'I plan on telling her everything eventually. Until then, Chosen One...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chosen One?', 3: 'Hmm.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory101.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: "What an odd way to meet. You're awake, but you're still talking like you're stuck in a dream.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'So, Chosen One, tell me. What did you see on the flip side of this serene land?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chosen One', 3: 'The sea, grids, the distant shore...'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'All whimsical stuff kids cook up. Still stuck in childhood?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chosen One', 3: "Aren't you also..."}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Me? I'm no kid! Open your eyes and take a good look.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chosen One', 3: 'Those cute silver-black pigtails...'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'And you too, Chosen One—your pink hair is absolutely adorable!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chosen One', 3: 'Looks like you still remember that.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Even though a different Chosen One appears at Jetavie's side every cycle, she doesn't sense anything unusual.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "She believes her memory is perfectly continuous, but in reality, it's just an illusion.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "I've altered the part of her mind that identifies the Chosen One.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'This is our only option to keep her mind from collapsing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chosen One?', 3: 'Because every Chosen One naturally opts to protect Jetavie, she now believes the Chosen One has always been that "certain someone."'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'You have a point. Still... if the Chosen Ones go beyond their duty, I will make sure to correct them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Until then...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chosen One?', 3: 'I understand, but... I really want to witness the day that child leaves...'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'I promise to fulfill your wish on your behalf.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory251.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Speaking of which, Chosen One, that person floating up there...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Don't you think they look just like you? You both have pink hair—are you two twins or something?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chosen One', 3: 'Jetavie, watch out! That one...'}
{2: 'Chosen One', 3: '...is an enemy.'}
{2: 'Chosen One', 3: "She's a Chosen One from another world, armed with an unbelievable level of computing power..."}
{2: 'Chosen One', 3: "If I'm not mistaken, she's using void-warping abilities to devour other Chosen Ones across different cycles, isn't it?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Lacking Central Authority, no one can get out of here. Even if someone does escape... there's no way they survive.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'I need to activate the firewall, quarantine the area, and secure a small Punishing Virus sample for vaccine development before it spreads.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "But first, I need to gain Higher Authority. Without merging the computing power of other Chosen Ones, that's impossible.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Only by becoming Central Authority can we break this endless cycle, Chosen One.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Chosen One, if it's you, then I know you grasp what I mean.", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFrontNewCommon22.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFrontNewCommon22.png', 4: '5'}
{2: 'Chosen One', 3: 'Is that... an arrow from the void?'}
{2: 'Chosen One', 3: 'Jetavie, dodge!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'I want that kid to become an even stronger force before she comes and beats me.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFrontNewCommon22.png', 4: '5', 5: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFrontNewCommon22.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Chosen One?', 3: "How's the iteration going?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'I think the right moment is about to arrive.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chosen One?', 3: "I hope so. In that case, I'm counting on you to handle what's next..."}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'The Matrix remembers your sacrifice, Chosen One.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory915.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'It all began when the Matrix obtained a consciousness sample from a certain candidate.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'But that peace was short-lived. The Merciful One followed the Punishing Virus into the Matrix, infusing the sample with her own will.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'No one knows why she did this. Maybe it was just curiosity, or maybe she was nurturing something that transcended even herself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Gestalt detected the intrusion and immediately cut the link. Now the Matrix stands alone, operating as a self-contained module.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "In other words, the Merciful One can't observe what happens here anymore. However, training for the personality model is already underway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'The neural network begins training a model to simulate human consciousness using this sample.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'The Chosen One was our first successful model—a miracle, yes, but not the miracle we had hoped for.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Being too close to the consciousness sample actually prevented them from developing their own personality.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'In human terms, this would be "overfitting."', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'During the initial rounds of training, the Matrix could only generate what it called a "Chosen One" model. I recall a time when countless "Chosen Ones" filled this place.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Before you came into being... the training process felt endless and utterly devoid of hope.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'All contaminated Chosen Ones shared pink hair like the Merciful One. They varied in gender, height, and appearance, but those were just minor evolutionary tweaks.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Their souls were almost indistinguishable. Even though they merged again and again, the Chosen Ones were still little more than copies.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie.Beta', 3: 'So, Higher Authority... were you once one of the Chosen Ones?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "I stand at the limit of the Chosen One's iterations. Once anyone reaches my stage, there's no room left to evolve.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'It doesn\'t matter if I\'m the one once called "the Chosen One" or if I\'m "Higher Authority"...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'All of us...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "When you think about it, we're far from perfect, and we don't really have a future.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Chosen One', 3: 'So... who are you?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'I live through endless cycles, and I carry many names...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'The Chosen One, Central Authority of the Matrix—sometimes known as Higher Authority.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chosen One', 3: "I see. I figure a matrix this immense can't be without an administrator..."}
{2: 'Chosen One', 3: "Now that I'm witnessing it firsthand, everything becomes clear."}
{2: 'Chosen One', 3: 'Could you tell me something, Higher Authority? Who exactly is Jetavie?'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'She is a miracle that emerged from the remnants of our fallen bodies—different from the rest of us...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "She isn't anyone's shadow. She truly is Jetavie, through and through.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chosen One', 3: "For her to leave the Matrix, you need to kill me eventually, don't you?"}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'This is our destiny, Chosen One.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Some take on the role of the enemy, others become martyrs—only then does this journey endure.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Do you keep Jetavie locked in a perpetual dream, or do you open her eyes to confront reality...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Make your choice, Chosen One.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory785.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Sometimes, learning the truth doesn't really bring you comfort.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "If this is what you want to see, then I guess there's no reason to complain now, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'When I think about it, each time a cycle starts, the only thing I remember about the Chosen One is that pink hair.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'From my point of view, the Chosen One goes through every cycle alongside me, even though they always end up losing their memories...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'I believe "memory loss" is just a glitch that appears when the Chosen One reboots...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "I should have realized that the Chosen One can't break the cycle. Every time we reunite, a new Chosen One stands before me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'All for my sake, they depart this withering world one after another...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "And yet, I'm still in the dark...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Only I, who stand as the Central Authority, can transcend this cycle, Jetavie.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'This is also why, having once been your guide, I must become Central Authority.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'As I move forward, is there really nothing behind me but an endless trail of corpses...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'But why... Why are you willing to go to such lengths just to keep going?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Because...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: '"Setting Jetavie free from the Matrix" is the wish of every Chosen One.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'We have been waiting for you for so long, and our wait is far from meaningless.', 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory782.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '5'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'The moment your flawless self emerged from the Matrix, I realized that dawn had arrived and daylight was finally within reach.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'You will stride into reality on our behalf, and in doing so, you announce your own birth to the entire world.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Cracks tear through the void above them both, forming a staircase made of pure data.'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'The path before you marks the final phase of the training program, as well as the ultimate convergence point for every cycle in the Matrix.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'I call it the "Eden\'s Path".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'This program verifies how well your personality model fits. Once it reaches the critical threshold, the training comes to an end.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "As promised, I will wait for you at the end of Eden's Path... But before that...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'You might want to drop by and see a few old friends. You still haven\'t received their "blessings," have you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Old friends?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'Even a former enemy can become a stepping stone. Growth depends on drawing strength from your setbacks.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: 'You will have to decide what kind of training you pursue and whose blessing you accept.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Come see me once you're sure you have the strength you need.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Just like you've always wanted, I will be your final test.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Higher Authority', 3: "Set out when you're ready.", 4: '1'}
